items.title: What keeps me sane..
items.content: I like to spend my time traveling, in nature, doing sports, or engaging in creative work.

items.title: I geek about..
items.content: Algorithms (randomized, sublinear) | Machine Learning (gml ,earth observation, neuro) | Graph Modelling (algo & gml).

items.content: Topography aware weather forecasting in Europe.

items.title: MSc Computational Scinece and Engineering @EPFL
items.content: TA for the class CS-450 Advanced Algorithms with Prof. M. Kapralov (Fall Semester 2025) | TCS-Coursework: Advanced Algorithms, Sublinear Algorithms, Topics in Theoretical CS (Randomized Algorithms) ; ML-Coursework: Machine Learning, Network Machine Learning, Foudnation Models and Generative AI, Learning in Neuronal Nets (Reinforcement Learning, Neuroplausible ML), Image Processing for Earth Observation
